H0.text: What word describes making beautiful with ornaments, or to decorate, etc. Adorn

H1.text: What word describes making beautiful with ornaments, or to decorate, etc. Ornate

H2.text: What word describes making beautiful with ornaments, or to decorate, etc. Beautify

H3.text: What word describes making beautiful with ornaments, or to decorate, etc. Embellish

A4.text: Adorn refers to decorative elements such as barnstars and purfling
